name: Saul Williams
description: '''Saul Stacey Williams''' (born February 29, 1972) is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, musician, poet, writer, and actor. He is known for his blend of poetry and [[alternative hip hop]], and for his lead roles in the 1998 independent film ''[[Slam (1998 film)|Slam]]'' and the 2013 jukebox musical [[Holler If Ya Hear Me (musical)|''Holler If Ya Hear Me'']].
